subject: Order SSN5720 Unfulfilled
description_text:
Hi!

I bought a  Plus X P2-H2  with baseplate and in the tracker information it
says the order is *Unfulfilled*. Could you explain what this status is and
when it is supposed to be delivered?.

Thanks and regards,

Daubas Emiliano

conversations.body_text: Hi Emiliano,     We apologize for the delayed response. Your package is currently in transit and is expected to arrive around the 19th. Below is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=2212221712
